i own a german shepard.
The most valuable thing I own is my ability to persevere through challenges.
i am trying to write an ebook on animals.

participant_2.background:
Riding horses is my favorite hobby.
I enjoy collecting autographs from my favorite celebrities and learning more about them.
I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors.
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.
my mom is a checker at the local grocery store.

content.text: Not much, just about to go for a ride on my horse.
Sounds fun, where do you ride?
I have my own horse, so I ride her at my home.
Thats awesome! I love horses. I have a German Shepherd, but I always wanted a horse.
Oh wow, I love German Shepherds! What's his name?
His name is Buddy, and he's the best dog ever.
I'm sure he is! I love how loyal and protective they are.
They are the best! What's your favorite thing to do with your horse?
I love to just go for trail rides, but I also enjoy competing in shows.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not sure I'm brave enough to compete in a show, but I would love to go on a trail ride sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to show you around my place.
Sounds like a plan! I'll bring Buddy with me, and we can explore the trails together.
